Faq.faqQuestionEight: How to activate my Kredivo account?
Faq.faqQuestionEighteen: Who can be reach out to for help?
Faq.faqQuestionEleven: Aside personal loan, how and where can I shop with Kredivo?
Faq.faqQuestionFifteen: Can I reapply my application upon getting rejected before?
Faq.faqQuestionFour: How much is Kredivo Credit Limit?
Faq.faqQuestionFourteen: Is my information sefe with Kredivo?
Faq.faqQuestionNine: How long personal loan will be disbursed to user?
Faq.faqQuestionSeven: Which document should be provided to apply Kredivo?
Faq.faqQuestionSeventeen: I am not keen on receiving the offer, what should I do?
Faq.faqQuestionSix: How to apply Kredivo via Klop! ?
Faq.faqQuestionSixteen: What if i don't activate my account upon requested date?
Faq.faqQuestionTen: Where the personal loan fund will be transfered?
Faq.faqQuestionThirteen: How to pay my Kredivo bill?
Faq.faqQuestionThree: What kind of features and services provided by Klop! x Kredivo ?
Faq.faqQuestionTwelve: When my bill will be due?
Faq.faqQuestionTwo: Who is eligible to register Kredivo via Klop! ?
Faq.faqSolutionEight:
If your application has been aproved, you will be sent SMS and email notification to activate your account. Select the link in the email or SMS to activate your account.

To continue, you should enter OTP code that we sent via SMS, set 6 digits PIN and answer 1 security question.

If success, you will receive email confirmation and Kredivo agreement to activate account from DocuSign. In the agreement you can find your ID card, your personal info and agreement that you agree as Kredivo user.

This agreement will have your digital signature and is legally binding and has legal force.
Faq.faqSolutionEighteen: You can email us at bantuan@klop.co
Faq.faqSolutionEleven:
You can pay with Kredivo in 350+ merchants online and offline. You only have to select Kredivo as your payment method in merchant's checkout website.

To continue, you should enter registered phone number and PIN, then enter OTP that we sent via SMS to confirm your transaction.
Faq.faqSolutionFifteen:
Yes, sure. Once rejected, you can re-apply in 3 months.
To improve the odds, try making more e-commerce transaction and pray more often so that your application can be approved. Don't forget to re-apply and may the force be with you.
Faq.faqSolutionFive:
To apply Kredivo, you should comply these following requirements:
- Indonesian citizen
- Age between 18 - 60 years old
- Located in Jabodetabek, Bandung, Surabaya, Semarang, Palembang, Medan, Bali, Yogyakarta, Solo, Makassar, Malang, Sukabumi, Cirebon
- Minimum monthly income Rp 3.000.000
Faq.faqSolutionFour: Pay in 30 days, you can get limit up to Rp 3.000.0000
Faq.faqSolutionFourteen: Yes, protecting your personal information is our top priority. We encrypt all sensitive data. We also provide physical, electronic and procedural safeguards to protect your information. We do not sell or rent your information to anyone unless required by the relevant agency to issue your loan or it is required to be given to the regulator.
Faq.faqSolutionNine: The fund will be disbursed maximum 1 working day. If you haven't receieved the fund within said duration, please contact our customer service in 0807-1-573348.
Faq.faqSolutionOne: Klop! x Kredivo is a partnership program where Kredivo as a provider for instant credit solution gives you access to get instant cash advance in 30 days to pay back.With instant approval, Kredivo gives you the freedom to fulfill all your needs now, pay later!
Faq.faqSolutionSeven:
You should upload this following documents:
- ID card - KTP
- Selfie
Faq.faqSolutionSeventeen: We will help you to make a report and will be followed up in accordance with standard procedures at Telkomsel
Faq.faqSolutionSix: You can apply for Kredivo via link that we sent through SMS.
Faq.faqSolutionSixteen: The due to activate your account is up to 30 days. Once you're late, you cannot activate your account. But don't worry, you can always re-apply via Kredivo app and re-do the whole registration process. Best of luck!
Faq.faqSolutionTen: Your personal loan will be disbursed to your registered bank account that you select in application process.
Faq.faqSolutionThirteen:
Payment information and method will be sent via SMS and email once your loan request has been approved. In email, you can check payment instruction and virtual account channel to pay your bill. You can pay via BCA, Mandiri, Permata, Indomaret, Alfamart, or Tokopedia virtual account.
Moreover, you can download Kredivo app and follow these following steps for payment:
1. Open your Kredivo app. Click Transaction then Pay. Select transaction that you want to pay.
2. Make payment thru your selected virtual account channel. If you select via ATM/ Bank, The bill will have same amount as your selected transaction.
3. If you skip step 1, you will see total bill amount from all of your transactions when you want to pay via VA channel.
For BCA and Permata channel, you can self input your paid amount. While, for Mandiri, Indomaret and Alfamart channel, you should follow step-1 to pay certain transaction.
Special case for Alfamart channel, you can only make one payment per day. Moreover, you can also pay your Kredivo bill via Tokopedia by simply open Tokopedia website, go to Payment & Top Up page then choose credit installment.
Once you received payment reminder email and only want to pay based on amount stated on the email, you should follow step-1.
Faq.faqSolutionThree:
With Kredivo credit limit you can apply for personal loan request up to Rp 3.000.000 with interest as low xx% compared to other financial institutions.

Moreover, your Kredivo credit limit can be used as payment in 350+ merchants online & offline which offer you a wide range of products & categories, from fashion, data package, airplane ticket or gadget and electronics with no credit card needed.
Faq.faqSolutionTwelve:
Your bill will be due in 30 days cycle from your approval date. The due date details will be notified via email and SMS that we sent right after loan has been approved.
Moreover, you can also check your loan details via Kredivo app.
Faq.faqSolutionTwo: Short listed Telkomsel users that received SMS invitation to get a credit limit opportunity up to IDR 3,000,000.
